references.paper_title: Depth map prediction from a single image using a multi-scale deep network
references.reason: This paper is foundational for single-image depth estimation, a key building block of the RollingDepth method.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Video Diffusion, a relevant video diffusion model that RollingDepth builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Stable Diffusion model, a foundation model that RollingDepth adapts for video depth estimation.

references.paper_title: Towards robust monocular depth estimation: Mixing datasets for zero-shot cross-dataset transfer
references.reason: This paper significantly advances single-image depth estimation, providing techniques that RollingDepth leverages for improved accuracy and generalization.

references.paper_title: Repurposing diffusion-based image generators for monocular depth estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces Marigold, the single-image LDM that RollingDepth extends to handle video inputs and temporal consistency.
